title: (AUDIO) Rick Santorum on Border Policy: We Need Less Legal Immigration Too! | Tom Sullivan Radio Show
text: Immigration has been a big issue this election cycle. But most of the the Republican presidential hopefuls have focused all their energy convincing voters they'd be tough on illegal immigrants. But Rick Santorum says his opponents policies don;t go far enough and he says its time we reduce t
